decks.notes: The key concept of this deck is to utilize a combo strategy called "Reaping the Song." The deck includes cards like Drannith Stinger, Imposing Vantasaur, and Drannith Healer to deal damage and gain life. It also features cards like Horror of the Broken Lands and Architects of Will to cycle through the deck quickly. The deck utilizes cards like Songs of the Damned and Cabal Ritual for ramp and Dark Ritual for additional mana. The goal is to generate a large amount of mana and cast Reaping the Graves to bring back multiple creatures from the graveyard for a powerful combo finish.

The focus of this deck is to control the game by using the Urzatron lands to generate large amounts of mana, which can be used to cast powerful spells and abilities. Various artifacts are used to ramp up mana production and draw cards, while sacrificing artifacts for value with cards like Makeshift Munitions and Ashnod's Altar. The deck also utilizes recursion with Myr Retriever and card advantage with Ichor Wellspring to maintain board presence and outvalue opponents in the long run.
